description: This is a React component for a frontend page called 'Home'. It includes UI components like buttons, spinners, modal dialogs, and an error banner. It manages states for modal open/close, loading, and error handling. The page simulates an asynchronous action, displays various UI elements demonstrating component usage, and includes interactions such as opening modals and retrying actions.

methods.name: simulateAction
methods.description: Asynchronous function that simulates an action with a delay and randomly sets an error message.
